dsense.name: enforce [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (law, rule: keep in force) (法律、规章等)

example.eg: The headteacher enforced the rules without making any exceptions.
example.egtrans: 校长强制执行了规章，不允许任何例外。

example.eg: Companies disregarding the new legislation will receive a court order to enforce compliance.
example.egtrans: 不遵守新法规的公司将收到强制执行的法庭令。

example.eg: They reinforced the doors with steel.
New troops arrived to reinforce those already on the ground.
example.egtrans: 新部队抵达，增援已在战场的部队。
